class graphics_items.ControllableItem(model, color=<PyQt5.QtGui.QColor object>, parent=None, label='', handle_size=4, handle_color=8, edge_color=2, edge_width=1, draw_flag=False, drag_flag=False)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsItem

A controllable graphics item has handles

Parameters

  • model (data_model.Geometry) -- must be a subclass of DataModels.Geometry

  • color (QColor) -- fill color

  • parent (QWidget) -- parent object, defaults to None

  • label (str) -- a label for this item

  • handle_size (int) -- size of the handls

  • handle_color (QColor) -- color of the handles

  • edge_color (QColor) -- color of the edges

  • edge_width -- width of the edges

Type

float

mousePressEvent(e)[source]¶

Defines the behaviour of polyline. 1. Clicking while holding control points while _drag_flag is set to true shifst the polylines 2. Clicking inside the bounding rect adds a control points 3. Holding ctr allows one to drag a control point

Parameters

e (QEvent) -- mouse event

Returns

None

Return type

None
